alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Morgan County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 3:53PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Weld, northeastern Arapahoe, southwestern Morgan and eastern Adams Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 353 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Roggen to 6 miles southeast of Byers, or along a line extending from 18 miles southeast of Greeley to 35 miles northwest of Limon. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Prospect Valley, Hoyt, Riverside Reservoir, Leader, Byers, and Roggen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
